Package com.tools.jtail

The only package (for now).

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    TailFile  
    Watcher
    Interface for watching for changes on the file that needs to be tailed.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FileInfo
    A fairly simple data object, with some additional file operations.
    FileSystemWatcher
    Implementation of the Watcher interface using the WatchService of NIO.2.
    Jtail
    JTail is my attempt at an implementation of the unix tail command in Java using the new NIO.2 classes.
    Options
    Parsing command line options and provide switches to the rest of the program.
    PollingWatcher
    The old fashion way of checking file changes.
    TailFileFactory
    Creates TailFile implementations depending on the requirements.

Package com.tools.jtail Description

The only package (for now). Contains all required class files for the jtail application.
